name: Office Escape (itch) (gummystudios)
description:
This is a game that was made in 1 week by Gummy Den and JustAGreenGuy. Coding by Gummy Den. Art/Sound by JustAGreenGuy.

You are stuck in an Office building. You need to escape. Click on a player and click somewhere to move them. Figure out how to open the door and escape each room. There are 10 rooms to escape and then you get the final cutscene. Each character has a different ability. 

Enjoy this little puzzle game!
